text: @ChrisMurphyCT And now, you blame Trump for Covid19.  And now there is even more evidence that China is to blame for the outbreak and delaying this information.  Too bad we can't prosecute political douche bags, like yourself, for outright lying to the American people.  Sorry for your family.
